product_name: Brunton Nomad G3 Pro Digital Compass
long_description: With the push of a button, the Brunton Nomad G3 Pro digital compass offers accurate headings, altitude, barometric pressure, exercise timers and temperature to keep you in sync with your environment. With daily alarms and a large backlit display, the latest generation of the proven Nomad series helps ensure you stay on course in the woods or after the sun goes down. Programmable compass gives a bearing to 1-degree accuracy; adjustable declination for fine-tuned local accuracy. Forward bearings supply accurate direction of travel; also shows temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit and features a clock, calendar and alarm. Altimeter features 1m resolution; barometer displays atmospheric pressure in Hg or mB with one-degree resolution. The Brunton Nomad G3 Pro digital compass comes with a CR2032 3V lithium battery and a neck/wrist lanyard.
short_description: With the push of a button, the Brunton Nomad G3 Pro digital compass offers accurate headings, altitude, barometric pressure, exercise timers and temperature to keep you in sync with your environment.
